review: All I wanted to be able to do was broadcast presentations from my iPhone phone to a ceiling mounted projector. While you can do that with the Chromecast, don't think it is easy. Think Rube Goldberg. You are eventually going to be successful, but only after dealing with woefully inadequate, inaccurate, or over-simplified directions which are all over the web. Also, you don't see it in the picture, but it comes with a power adapter that must be plugged into an outlet, then into the Chromecast gadget. Did I mention the projector location...on the ceiling?
